release dates: Puerto Rico::7 August 2011                            (San Juan, Puerto Rico) (TV Premier)
locations: Calle Ruiz Belvis & Calle Padial Caguas, Puerto Rico::(Centro de Bellas Artes de Caguas)
imdb.plot outline: Idol Puerto Rico is the Puerto Rico reality television edition of the British show Pop Idol. Like its international counterparts, the show employs a panel of judges to select singers in audition, then adding other elements such as telephone voting by the viewing public and the drama of backstories and real-life soap opera unfolding in real time. The show debuted in 2011 in Puerto Rico with Paola Portilla, Luciano Cardinali, and Jimmy Arteaga as producers. In 2012, the show was renewed for a second season which debuted in July 29, 2012.
imdb.title: Idol Puerto Rico
plot: _Idol Puerto Rico_ (qv) is the Puerto Rico reality television edition of the British show Pop Idol. Like its international counterparts, the show employs a panel of judges to select singers in audition, then adding other elements such as telephone voting by the viewing public and the drama of backstories and real-life soap opera unfolding in real time. The show debuted in 2011 in Puerto Rico with Paola Portilla, Luciano Cardinali, and Jimmy Arteaga as producers. In 2012, the show was renewed for a second season which debuted in July 29, 2012.::Wikipedia
